metadata.name: The Battle for Supremacy
metadata.description:
"The Battle for Supremacy," 

I approached this work with the intention of capturing the raw emotions and intense struggles that arise in the pursuit of power in this crypto world. Through the use of dark colors, bold lines, and dynamic composition, I aimed to create a piece that not only conveyed the physical struggle, but also the psychological and emotional toll that comes with the battle for dominance.

For me, the process of creating this piece was a journey of self-discovery and exploration. As I worked on the various elements, I found myself grappling with the many facets of power and control, and the consequences that come with them.

In the end, I am proud of the work that I have produced. I believe that it speaks to the universality of the human experience and the ongoing battle for supremacy that takes place in all of our lives. Whether it be on a personal, societal, or global scale, the struggle for power is a timeless theme that is as relevant today as it was in the past.
